text: Dynamite Clothing (stylized as DYNAMITE) is a clothing store catered to women between the ages of 25 and 30 years old. Founded in 1984 as a subsidiary of Groupe Dynamite, Dynamite currently has locations in Canada, the United States, Jordan and Saudi Arabia. Alongside its sister brand, Garage, Dynamite has been recognized as one of Canada's Top Employers for young people in 2019. The current CEO, Andrew Lutfy, has started working at Groupe Dynamite at the age of 18 and was one of the creators of the Dynamite clothing brand. Dynamite contributes to the CURE Foundation, a Canadian foundation that provides funding for basic and clinical research for breast cancer. ==History== *1984 – Opening of the first Dynamite store in Carrefour Laval *1986 – Beginning of a private label collection *2013 – Dynamite e-commerce launched in Canada *2013 – Dynamite opening of the first store in the U.S., located in Lake Grove, New York *2014 – Dynamite e-commerce launched in the U.S. ==Stores== There are 127 stores in operation across 5 countries. ;Dynamite Stores * 117 * 4 * 3 * 2 * 1 == References == ==External links== * Category:Clothing retailers of Canada Dynamite Clothing Category:Clothing brands Category:Companies based in Montreal Category:1984 establishments in Quebec
title: Dynamite Clothing
